info.title: SPEI CLABEs API
info.description: The Bitso API allows you to integrate the SPEI features to create CLABEs and get its information. Below you will find details on how the system works, along with examples in common programming languages.

get.description: Returns all user CLABEs for the authenticated user.

schema.description: Time window start date with format yyyy-mm-dd.
Time window end date with format yyyy-mm-dd.

200.description: Returns the user CLABEs for the authenticated user.

clabe.description: The associated CLABE of the user

status.description: The status of the CLABE indicating whether it is enabled or disabled.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the CLABE was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the CLABE was last updated

error.message: start_date: date must match with format yyyy-MM-dd
end_date: date must match with format yyyy-MM-dd
clabe_type: must be any of enum [MAIN, INTERNATIONAL, ADDITIONAL, ADDITIONAL_INTERNATIONAL]
status: must be any of [ENABLED, DISABLED]
start_date: parameter is after end_date parameter
size: must be less then or equal to 100
The requested resource is non-existent or does not belong to the user

post.description: Creates a CLABE for the authenticated user.

clabe.description: The associated CLABE of the user

status.description: The status of the CLABE indicating whether it is enabled or disabled.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the CLABE was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the CLABE was last updated

error.message: The specified user is not onboarded for additional CLABEs

get.description: Returns the CLABE resource if it exists for the authenticated user.

schema.description: The associated clabe of the user

clabe.description: The associated CLABE of the user

status.description: The status of the CLABE indicating whether it is enabled or disabled.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the CLABE was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the CLABE was last updated

error.message: The requested resource is non-existent or does not belong to the user

put.description: Enables or disables a CLABE of the authenticated user.

requestBody.description: Update an existent CLABE belonging to a User

status.description: The status to set the CLABE to.

clabe.description: The associated CLABE of the user

status.description: The status of the CLABE indicating whether it is enabled or disabled.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the CLABE was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the CLABE was last updated

error.message: clabe: It is not possible to update the status of a MAIN clabe
clabe: It is not possible to update the status of a INTERNATIONAL clabe
The specified user is not onboarded for additional CLABEs

get.description: Returns a paginated SPEI Deposits according to the query parameters.

schema.description: The associated clabe of the user receiving the deposit.
The clabe associated with the sender of the deposit.
The type of the receiver CLABE
The start date of the desired period for filtering deposits.
The end date of the desired period for filtering deposits.
The number of elements per page in the paginated response.
The page number of the paginated response.

deposit_id.description: The deposit’s ID provided by Bitso.

sender_clabe.description: The CLABE that sent the deposit.

receiver_clabe.description: The CLABE that received the deposit.

currency.description: The currency ticker of the deposit.

sender_name.description: Name of the financial institution that sent the deposit.

sender_bank.description: Code of the financial institution that sent the deposit.

clave.description: The deposit’s ID supplied by the PRAXIS provider.

clave_rastreo.description: The deposit’s ID assigned by BANXICO.

numeric_reference.description: An identification number the sender provides that can be used to filter transactions—for example, a date.

concepto.description: An alpha-numeric description of the deposit.

cep_link.description: The link to download the transaction receipt generated by BANXICO.

created_at.description: The date when the system created the deposit.

updated_at.description: The last date when the system updated the deposit.

error.message: start_date: date must match with format yyyy-MM-dd
end_date: date must match with format yyyy-MM-dd
clabe_type: must be any of enum [MAIN, INTERNATIONAL, ADDITIONAL, ADDITIONAL_INTERNATIONAL]
deposit_status: must be any of enum [no_status, pending, complete, failed, verify, in_progress]
start_date: parameter is after end_date parameter
size: must be less then or equal to 100
size: Invalid parameter value, please validate your request
page: Invalid parameter value, please validate your request
